Package: sk.hax.software.darksigns.client

[Groovy] Class FileServer

    • sk.hax.software.darksigns.client.FileServer
    • All Implemented Interfaces and Traits:
      Task

      class FileServer

      File server task for sharing files on the local storage. The server always listens on port 21. A request to the server must contain the operation (get, put), the filename, and for the put operation also the file type (binary, text) and content. The response of the server contains the operation (get, put), result status (success, error), and for a successful get operation also the file type (binary, text) and content. The server has a specific directory on the local storage designated as shared. Any files in that directory are accessible remotely.

      Authors:
      mio
      See Also:
      FileTransferRequest
      FileTransferResponse
